word_mean: 渗滤器：用于渗滤药物的器具

sentence.Network_en: He watched the coffee beating in the cracked dome of the percolator.
sentence.Network_cn: 他注视着咖啡壶破裂的圆顶内翻腾的咖啡.

sentence.Network_cn: 你试用一下过滤咖啡粉怎么样?

sentence.Network_en: Add the correct amount of water and reassemble the percolator.
sentence.Network_cn: 添加正确的水量和组装的过滤器.

entry.def: A percolator is a piece of equipment for making and serving coffee, in which steam passes through crushed coffee beans.

means.word_mean: 1. a coffeepot in which boiling water ascends through a central tube and filters back down through a basket of ground coffee beans

auth_sentence.content: When he leaves half an inch of gritty black goo in the bottom of the percolator, he knows what he's doing.
